mapper.select: select com_num, content, writer, reg, ref, re_level, re_step, is_delete, num from comments where num = #{num} and is_delete = 1 order by ref asc, re_step asc
mapper.insert: insert into comments (com_num, content, writer, reg, ref, re_level, re_step, is_delete, num) values(comments_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0, 1, #{num})
mapper.update: update comments set is_delete = 0 where com_num = #{com_num}
update comments set ref = #{ref} where com_num = #{com_num}
